meanings.definition: An attack made in response to an enemy's attack.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers launched counterattacks to defend their territory.
meanings.sent2: The general ordered counterattacks to push back the invading army.
meanings.sent3: During the battle, the counterattacks turned the tide in our favor.
meanings.sent4: The counterattacks were like a shield protecting our forces.
meanings.sent5: The swift counterattacks caught the enemy off guard.

meanings.definition: To make an attack in response to an enemy's attack.
meanings.sent1: The army counterattacks when threatened by the enemy.
meanings.sent2: She counterattacks immediately after being struck.
meanings.sent3: The cat counterattacks playfully when teased.
meanings.sent4: He counterattacks with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: The team counterattacks swiftly and decisively.
